metadata.name: Heritage Of Pottery
metadata.description:
Kerala is known for its heritage of pottery. The way the traditional artisans of Kerala mould clay to make beautiful pots and other household utensils will certainly surprise everyone. The pottery villages of Kerala welcome you to experience the art of pottery making and to discover the tricks involved in it.

Photo By Manoop Chandran

Edition - 1 / 1

Year - 2021

Camera & Lens - Canon 5 D MARK 3 , 24 - 70  2.8
